metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser
metadata.comment: Detects manual execution of the "Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser" task via schtasks. In order to trigger persistence stored in the "\AppCompatFlags\TelemetryController" registry key.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('schtasks.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('run ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\application experience\\\\microsoft compatibility appraiser')))

output.summary: Detects manual execution of the "Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser" task via schtasks. In order to trigger persistence stored in the "\AppCompatFlags\TelemetryController" registry key.
